casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Robert Walter HUFFMAN 328P06-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 17, 2017 Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, C. Ricky Bowman, District Attorney, for State of NC. Robert Walter Huffman, for Huffman, Robert Walter.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th of August 2017 by Defendant for Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of October 2017."
